name: Nelu Lotus Guardian
description:
Discover the jungle with Nelu on this 2D adventure game where you will wander through the amazon rainforest solving puzzles, making friends and fighting enemies.

This web browser game offers a single player experience and a two player online versus mode for those who like to battle between each other. And the best part is that it has mobile integration, making you able to play on the go on your smartphone.

Some attributions for the in-game music:

Firebrand by Kevin MacLeod
